name: Little Loco
description:
Little Loco is a small, relaxing "Idle Game" where you control a train and explore an open forest environment.

Control the speed of your train and change the directions of certain rails to make your way to "Stations".

Stopping at a station will reward you with "Money", which you can use to upgrade your engine, buy more carriages that carry "Passengers" or "Freight", and also upgrade each of the carriages you already own!

The more carriages you have, the more money you'll make at each station!

Keep levelling up and upgrading your train and its carriages to make more money! See how much you can get in a run and see how much of the map you can explore!

This game uses an experimental technique called "Sprite-Stacking" to draw 3D models in a 2D world. The art style was crafted to be retro and inviting for new and returning players!

I hope you all enjoy the game and please feel free to review or start discussions/leave feedback in the comments below!
